website_summaries.verdict: Combined with its 3 foot-long leash, you and your cat will have freedom of movement and in a comfortable manner with the product's universal fit and feel.
pros: We love this product for its H-shape and ability to distribute pressure through multiple areas on your cat's body, easing your pet into being led on a leash
cons: The structure is designed for comfort yet some cats may easily slide their way out

customer_reviews.title: ... are very well constructed Darla and Sheldon couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of the harnesses which are very well constructed Darla and Sheldon couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Megan dobson

customer_reviews.title: Fit just right
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 lb cat. He is not a fat cat, just large and this just fits him.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Company!
customer_reviews.text: This company was great! The packaging was extremely cute and they even included a thank you card! They work very hard to ensure you enjoy your product. Just above and beyond. Their branding is also really great. As far as the cat harness goes, my cat is a bit heavy so it's a tight fit, but works great! He loves going outside and this allows him to.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great harness, the adjustment lets me fit it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great harness, the adjustment lets me fit it on my little 10 pound cat. He doesn't really mind it however he has always been really relaxed. The quality is very good and durable. Escape proof unless the harness is too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Thac

customer_reviews.title: 50 shades of cat.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our indoor cat so she could experience the outside world. The second we put it on she started tiptoeing around begging for affection, and became very passive. She would just lay on our laps and purr. As soon as we took it off, she went back to running around the house and ignoring us. So, I have no idea if this is a good product, I just learned that my cat is into BDSM.
customer_reviews.author: Operator

customer_reviews.title: easy to use pet harness
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat so we could take her on the patio without worrying about her jumping off. It is a good size for a cat or small dog. My cat is 7.5 pounds and it would still fit a bigger cat. It is easy to adjust and get on.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Everything came well packaged and it seems like a good quality item. My kitten is 4 months so it doesn't fit her just yet. Even though its loose on her, she still can't slip out of it. She hated wearing it at first but by the second day, she was already used to it. I love the shade of light pink, especially because it matches her nose! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: I put the harness on her and the neck and stomach loops were pulling towards each other so hard that it looked like it was pressing into her neck (possibly choking her) ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit our cat. She's about 12 pounds. The issue wasn't the parts that go around the neck or stomach; it was the little strip that goes over the shoulders and connects the two parts. It's far too short! I put the harness on her and the neck and stomach loops were pulling towards each other so hard that it looked like it was pressing into her neck (possibly choking her) and digging into her armpits. She was quite uncomfortable and unhappy with it. Maybe our cat just has super long shoulders, I don't know, but this product certainly didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Alexandria Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Get this rather than one you have to pull over their heads!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats, an 11lber and and 8 lber. This fits both. First I bought one of those jacket looming harnesses, but one cat HATED having it pulled over her head, and I could see it wouldn't fit the bigger cat, so I never tried. This one is easier to put on because you clip it like a collar instead of shoving their head through a hole. Both tolerate this one much better!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit & Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My cat weighs between 12.5-13 lbs and this fit him just fine. I had to make just a few adjustments to the straps. I love the reflective strips! They are helpful for when he wants to go out at night. It's also very easy to take off. It doesn't have to go over his head or anything. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust and easy for your kitty to adapt to!
customer_reviews.text: While I still haven't used the leash, the harness was easy to adjust and my cat had absolutely no problem wearing it from the first moment I put it on. Having to travel cross country with my cat was a little worrisome, having heard horror stories of pets escaping from cars, never to be seen again; but I felt sure that this harness would help me keep my precious kitty from going on the lam. And we made it safe and sound. I highly recommend this for your cat, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough between neck and body strap
customer_reviews.text: Not adjustable between the neck and body strap. It tends to choke our adult cat when he walks. The neck and body straps were perfectly adjustable, it was just the place where they meet in the back that was a little short and not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Willis

customer_reviews.title: True size, good product!
customer_reviews.text: True fit and fits well, even on my 16lb cat! Lol. She doesn't like it, but I will when taking her across the country to prevent her from running off. The material seems durable and it's easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased!
customer_reviews.text: The little note that came with this was so sweet, and it fits my super chubby cat just fine (wasn't sure it would). She is a very anxious kitty, so I am still working on getting her used to it, but it's light and has a gentle click that doesn't freak her out. The instructions on the back of the package were really helpful. Nice leash that comes with it. I'm super happy with this and can't wait to start taking my nervous cat on walks. Honestly no complaints, fully deserves the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Molly McCormick

customer_reviews.title: She's so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love how adorable this halter and leash is on my cat. She is 6lbs and I was able to adjust it to her small frame. She wasn't afraid of it and actually enjoys the halter. I would highly recommend this to someone who is interested in possibly trying to walk their cat.
customer_reviews.author: Fei L.

customer_reviews.title: Cat, NO! Owner, YES!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. The cat, not so much. I was taking her on vacation with me and a harness and leash were necessary so she could get out of the car. I had tried a solid harness, but she slithered out of it and ran under the car. This one fit well and she was unable to escape. She did pretty well on the trip, with only occasional pouting. Everyone told her how beautiful she looked in her harness. After the first day, she quit fighting it, so I know it must have been comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Foerster

customer_reviews.title: Not escape proof
customer_reviews.text: Got these for both my cats, both escaped them within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: fFits our 12lb cat well. She did not fight ...
customer_reviews.text: fFits our 12lb cat well. She did not fight it when we put it on her and after a couple days of getting used to we are able to take the cat for a short walk. Surprised !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that directions came with it that gave really good ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't totally fit my fat cat, but I made it work by placing the longer part of the harness around his front. I like that directions came with it that gave really good behavioral advice on getting the cats to get used to it. I only got it so that my cats can be brushed while outside so that I don't get their hairballs on our floors.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rogan

customer_reviews.title: Reds are great. Rainbow ones are bad.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of these for tiny dogs and my cat during the last year. Functionally they are fine, and Cat only lost hgis once, so 5 start os that. BUT. The ones I ordered before were red, and they were made from some very good material, one of them is year old and looks like new. The fancy rainbow one though is flimsy and is nearly ruined after 2 weeks of wear. Granted, he walks though thorn bushes in it and chews on it; but it is much, much worse than the previous (red) ones. I still heartily recommend this product, but not the rainbow model.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Bam

customer_reviews.title: but my kids love to put their harnesses on and sit outside with ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats are not sure what to think, but my kids love to put their harnesses on and sit outside with them from time to time! Product works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: crump711

customer_reviews.title: so good! No kitty slips yet
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! No kitty slips yet. He doesn't seem to mind being in the harness at all, and he LOVES the adventures outside! Seems to be a fairly solid piece, comfortable for kitty, and a pretty blue color. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our furbaby!
customer_reviews.text: Let the safe exploring begin! Perfect harness and collar for our furry babe. He is taking to it way quicker than we thought. We tried a heavier “vest” style first which he hated. He doesn’t have a problem with this one at all and the orange color is rich and fabulous. There is absolutely no playing outside without it, he is a total indoor cat but now we can all be outside together. Total win for the family!
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This cat harness is lightweight, mid-price ranged, and comes in nice colors. I bought it so that my cat, Charlie, could wander around my apartment patio with me as I sat outside and read. It has proven to be a great buy, and worth the low price. My only issue with the harness is the accompanying leash that come with it. Although it’s also sturdy, it measures only 2 feet long, so Charlie can’t fully wander around the patio without getting caught on a flower pot. I have added my own extra length to the chord by purchasing a ln extra 2 ft bungee chord. This has made all the difference. Now he can wander freely and enjoys sunbathing.
customer_reviews.author: HelloDanMo

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for cats
customer_reviews.text: Our rescue is used to a collar, so adjusting him to the harness was a breeze. First day he rolled on the floor and managed to open the collar around the neck leaving the harness to fall down near his back legs. He was jumping around in a panic trying to get out of the harness. Second day he managed to get the neck collar caught between his upper and lower jaw. Luckily we were with him and managed to get it opened, but not before he'd stressed out trying to get it out of his mouth. I really wouldn't recommend this harness. The clips aren't escape proof and the fit just doesn't work for cats.
customer_reviews.author: CraftingDiva

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: We ordered one red and one blue set for our international move. The cats wore them for the plane ride and the majority of the time at our hotel. It took a bit for them to get used to (definitely make them wear it a couple of times before it is necessary!) but they didn't mind it too much after they got used to it. We purchased this style because both the neck and chest is adjustable whereas a lot of the more comfortable looking ones had set sizes for the neck and I was scared of them wriggling their way out. They did their job so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shellbell

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is weird
customer_reviews.text: It seems well made and the overall fit is decent, I would say for small-medium size cats though. What brings the usefulness down for me is the very short length of the upper strap that connects the two loops that go around the cat. It's barely a few inches and ends up fitting very awkwardly on the cat. I considered cutting it and sewing an extension in but the material is very thick. This sizing makes it unusable for my cat.
customer_reviews.author: A. Post

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: No issues so far. Have been training my cat to wear it and while she does still chew the leash and attack it occasionally otherwise she doesn’t seem to mind it and was easy to take on and off her. Not sure how escape proof it is as she’s calm with it on and doesn’t try to get out of it but will update if any issues or any unsuccessfully escape attempts.
customer_reviews.author: Roch_Sue

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty. I'm just too scared to use it now. I had it on snug. My cat silently got her lower jaw underneath it to get out and got stuck. Freaked out. Unfortunately the release/connector is under that part of her mouth. I got ripped up pretty bad getting it off her. The vet said the blood was mine. Similarly, the same thing happened to a friend of mine only they ended up in the ER with jaw injury. I think more vest-like harnesses are a must with these smart cats. The skinny pieces are too dangerous. Not safe to use and I bought 3. I'd like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Works good for my energetic kitty
customer_reviews.text: My 1yr old 12 lb cat is able to wear this without breaking free. This is a big feat because he enjoys challenges and has escaped harnesses before. The harness is strong and of a good quality. It's not bulky so it was a pretty easy transition to prepare him for wearing the harness. The thin straps lead to an easier adjustment to wearing a harness. It's withstood squirming and chewing and is still fully functional, no worse for wear. My cat was able to adjust and is now fine when he wears his harness. Advice: test out walking inside first to ensure the harness is fitted properly & your cat is comfortable using it.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter K

customer_reviews.title: NOT EASY TO PUT ON OR OFF
customer_reviews.text: Just so buyers know, in my opinion it takes TWO to put this on and remove it...the clips are, well, strange..and you can’t see what you are doing, plus I have arthritis, so my fingers are not very dextrous; the clips are hard to get in right...they are very tricky! And taking it iff, opening the clips, is even more difficult! . I gave up after using it a few times...just too difficult, especially as the cat decided he hated it after the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Sagesmoke

customer_reviews.title: My bad. Should not have left him unattended for even ...
customer_reviews.text: And my Benson took to it right away (this, however, is totally dependent on the individual cat. my other one fell on her side and refused to move. more work needed). I made the mistake of tethering him to the front porch railing for a few minutes; not a bright move. Something startled him, he flew into a panic and eventually slipped the harness completely! My bad. Should not have left him unattended for even a few minutes; will try again in a few days but I expect he'll be fine if I clean up MY act.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Lee

customer_reviews.title: OK BUT NOT ENGINEERED GREAT. The harness is well made
customer_reviews.text: OK BUT NOT ENGINEERED GREAT. The harness is well made, but the neck collar portion of the device does not allow the proper adjustment. The neck strap can not slide through the front neck loop and the attaching plastic connector is located on the adams apple portion of the cat. This could be problematic if your walking the cat and there is any resistance, the cat gets choked. I cut the front strap away, opened the loop so the strap could be inserted freely and reinstalled the front collar. Now the strap is at the back the collar.
customer_reviews.author: AKRANGER

customer_reviews.title: Best cat harness I've encountered yet please read my review
customer_reviews.text: Best cat harness I've encountered yet very soft non-irritating and the adjustable feature is very good , allows you to fit to just about any chest or neck size of a cat The reflective feature as well is a nice extra Super product
customer_reviews.author: bridget f.

customer_reviews.title: My cat forgets she's wearing it
customer_reviews.text: I use this harness for my cat whenever we fly together. She doesn't mind wearing the harness in the carrier - I think she forgets it's there, the airport is pretty distracting. The leash I keep in the side pouch of her carrier. When we're waiting for flights, I open her carrier and clip the leash on so she can poke her head out and feel less trapped, while also making sure she can't go anywhere if she gets spooked. It makes us both feel better when we have lengthy layovers or delays - she's the sort of cat who needs to see what's going on, so that little added freedom from the harness and leash is perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: Becca Chantel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this harness
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this harness!! This was the third one I tried for my cat and he actually seemed comfortable in it! It has a very sleek design and the material is great in that it’s not super rigid and holds creases due to packaging. My favorite feature is the reflective material. It’s very visible which gives me comfort in the small Chance he gets off his leash he will be spotted fairly easily. Overall extremely happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, feels secure, cat is having a great time!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have taken my cat out on walks five times already, and he is loving the adventures. It was easily adjusted to fit him perfectly and snug, and he had made multiple attempts to escape from the harness at first without any success. If you are paying attention to your kitty and are close enough to react I do not see any cause for concern of immediate escape (unless you have a Harry Houdini kitty, which is possible).
customer_reviews.author: Raini Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good harness and leash.
customer_reviews.text: My cat was an inside cat who had never been outside. He was dying from a brain tumor so we decided to fill a bucket list for him. One thing we wanted to do was let him spend time outdoors. This was a safe way to do it. My only complaint was it was difficult to latch and unlatch the buckles.
customer_reviews.author: D.T.

customer_reviews.title: This got us a through security at the airport
customer_reviews.text: My cat actually doesn’t mind this harness. He hates the vest type ones. We had two flights from Germany back to the USA and we had to go through security twice. The first time he was in his leash. The second time through customs je somehow unclipped his leash from his harness(leash was attached to bag) and I had to hold his harness. Harness stayed in tact. Didn’t go off in a metal detector. Would highly recommend if you have to travel with a cat.
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats on the move- little hard to put on!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a few different harnesses for my cat this year. He is a larger cat and is very curious, so I wanted something that wouldn’t let him slip out. So far this is the best one I’ve found that also is comfortable for large cats. The only complaint I have it it’s harder to put on than some of the other types. My cat doesn’t like to sit still because he gets excited. This makes it hard because the clips on these are pretty small. But once it’s on, it’s great! He has tons of flexibility in this and it seems not to bother him. We go on walks all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey S.

customer_reviews.title: Harness for cat!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Kind of too big for my small kitty but in due time he will grow into it! Package came on time!
customer_reviews.author: Santita

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It was a two pack of leashes/harnesses and they are adjustable. They fit our younger smaller cat and our older fat cat 🐱. They are lightweight so they didn’t bog down our cars trying to wear them. I like that the leash will detach so the cat can wear the harness in the house to get used to it. Our smaller cat started walking with it after a few attempts of just sitting with it on at the park. The larger older cat is still not used to it yet but I think he will enjoy it after some time. Nice packaging. Overall very pleased for the money. Perfect price point.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLIE DAN

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with this. If it’s in too tight it painfully rub your cat. If it’s in too loose, the cat can try to wriggle out and get stuck. Mine got it stuck on his lower jaw. His poor mouth was forced open, and he was gagging. It was scary until I got it off of him. After that, I went with one that covers like a shirt instead of one with straps.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Cat is Sooooooo Happy
customer_reviews.text: My cat is strictly indoors, but I felt bad for her. Of course she hates being put in the leash, but she knows it means going outside now, so she brings it to me. She can't wriggle out of it, and she's a very small adult (6 lbs). She cries at the back door constantly now to be taken outside (she even reaches for the door handle), but that's how I know she adores exploring her yard. This leash improved her life a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C.

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect harness & leash set
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 indoor cats, 8 yo sisters. I live on the 4th floor & I enjoy being out on the balcony. My cats are always near me so they lay by the door or on the window ledge. I decided to buy a harness & leash set but, didn’t want to spend too much as they’re indoor cats & my objective is to simply allow them to rest on balcony, securely. I love the red & pink set for my black purrrty girls! Meow meow from Kina & Kahlua
customer_reviews.author: G206

customer_reviews.title: Nice Harness
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our cat. He loves to be outside, but we don't want him going in the street or chasing animals all over the neighborhood. This is our second purchase of the PUPTECH. The spring clip broke on the connection harness clasp and that made it very difficult to open and close, so we purchased another. Maybe it is covered under a warranty?? We didn't check or ask for a replacement... probably should have.
customer_reviews.author: Experienced

customer_reviews.title: Good harness...easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Have use this this harness almost every day since it arrived. We adopted an 8 yo cat who had never spent any time outside. At first she hated the harness but we persisted and she now calmly waits while we (easily) clip it on and attach the leash. She really enjoys her adventures in the backyard and we feel confident she cannot easily get away....just make sure the harness is tight enough. She looks exactly like the cat on the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: B Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Harness
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Slim harness with neck and body security so he can't escape. Does not have to be too tight on him like other harnesses. Pictures are from day one, I put it on him for a whole day inside so he would get used to it. He refused to move at the beginning but eventually got used to it and is normal. Now I can just put it on him whenever I take him outside and he is fine with it. Great product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Surprised how sturdy this is!!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Love the instructions on the back! Very good tips! I've seen too many videos where people put a harness on a cat then just take the cat outside :P These tips are much better though I skipped a few with my cat because she's young and was ready to go. 2. Sturdy! This really stays on even when there are times that my kitty freaks out a little (ex: loud car goes by) or decides she desperately needs to chase a chipmunk.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted two kittens at the animal shelter, they’re both 6 months old. Thought I’d tried to do some harness and leash training. After searching online, I went with these based on reviews and pricing. I also wanted somethi simple and black but also something comfortable for them. When it arrived, I thought the quality was great. It feels softer than what you can buy at PetSmart or Petco. Plus it’s much affordable! Introducing both kittens to the harness and leash went great! I personally like this set. Definitely worth it the price I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Dang

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I could take my cat outside safely. He has another kind, but it’s velcro, and the noise always startles him. This harness is super-easy to adjust, put on and take off. It’s well made, and the included leash makes it a bargain. Artie had no problem accepting it and was happy to walk around with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Hines

customer_reviews.title: One Cat likes it and the other hates it.
customer_reviews.text: One Cat likes it and the other hates it. Can't do anything about it and hope to eventually get the one cat to at least tolerate it. Not the Harness fault. The quality leaves something to be desired as I had to ship one back due to defects and then had to pay shipping on it because I didn't have a big enough order. This sucks in my opinion as it was damaged through no fault of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Harness for a Traveling Cat
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect harness for Murphy, my small (10 pound) cat. We travel often, and the harness allows him to be safely leashed for a little exploring when we stop in a new place. Murphy seems to not even notice that he is wearing the Puptech harness’ as it is loose enough for daily wear, but snug enough to provide security. The harness does not rub off his fur, either, which had happened with another harness brand.
customer_reviews.author: J D Thomas

customer_reviews.title: She didn't escape this harness
customer_reviews.text: I mean... she's a cat. She went limp noodle on me when I put the harness on her and acted like she was paralyzed. But I left it on her, and after a few hours we tried putting the leash on. After a few days of leash walking in the house, she made it down the first three steps to our house. She may not love it BUT, she didn't escape, and I think eventually she will like it more.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Peak

customer_reviews.title: so I decided to go with an adjustable one and this worked great! I'm not looking to walk my cat around ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit overwhelming trying to figure out what kind of harness would fit my cat, so I decided to go with an adjustable one and this worked great! I'm not looking to walk my cat around town, I just wanted something secure so I could take him out on the balcony of my upstairs apartment and just sit outside. This was a great inexpensive option and it worked out perfectly for what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an inexpensive, sturdy and secure harness for my Tom. He absolutely hates it, but it's what I wanted to protect him when I have to take him away from our home. He's about 10 to 12 pounds. The length of the straps were just long enough to fit him. So far he's been unable to get to the straps to chew them off. If he succeeds, I'll just buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Utah

customer_reviews.title: Worked on my cat
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you snug this up a bit. My cat got a little panicky when I had her outside. I had it on a little too loose and I think she may have been able wiggle out of it, if I hadn't scooped her up into my arms. Other than user error, it seems to work fine. It was easy to put on and take off. My cat didn't seem to mind it too much. I haven't used it very often so I can't speak for how sturdy it is for long term use. But so far I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: funny side effect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this harness for my indoor kitty, so she could be outside safely once in awhile. I also have an indoor/outdoor kitty. The 2 cats loathe each other, and indoor cat is the instigator, always stalking, chasing, attacking. Well, once I put the harness on her, she got all dramatic and fell over! She acts like she is being restrained , even when the leash is not attached. This turned out to be a good thing, because she will only lay low now when outdoor kitty comes inside, a lot less hissing, fighting! Bonus! She can walk in it , she is just a weirdo!
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Kilby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: We used this for only three days when the buckle unsnapped and our cat escaped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and secure
customer_reviews.text: My kitty hates her carrier, so I got this to see if she'd tolerate her vet visits better. And she did! Everyone thought she looked so cute in her harness. The pink is really pretty. It seems very secure, and it's adjustable so it fit my fat 13-pound cat! It's not as safe for a car ride as a carrier, so I am by no means suggesting you should use it in the car! But it's perfect for once you've arrived at your destination to let your kitty feel a little more free, if that's what she wants.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the harness to go in a canvas tote that has a latch hook in it so I can take my cat with me without worrying If she would jump out. Hooks in perfectly. Use the leash with the harness on long car trips to let her out to stretch our legs. Gave 5 stars for comfort because she doesn't complain but you'd have to ask my cat! Great buy. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: A bit small
customer_reviews.text: The distance between the collar strap and the chest strap is a little bit short. I have a fairly small cat and if it was just a quarter inch longer it would be perfect. with the neck and chest strap pretty loose she doesn't seem to mind having it on though. Going to have to watch her in the house for a few days to make sure she can't wiggle her way out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Yup, it's a cat harness alright
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a straightforward thing to review, because I feel like it's really not a given that any cat is going to be into wearing a harness in the first place. For the price, I figured I would give it a try when my old cat suddenly developed an interest in going outside. It was easy to put on and take off. I think the leash could have been longer, but overall I was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Phila

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I've got one 6 year old 10-11 lb calico and one 9 month old tortie who is still growing. This harness works great for both of them. Easy to put on and put a bell and tag on the harness. Both cats act pathetic when worn (because cats) but nether have shown any pain or discomfort with these harnesses. I love the variation of colors too. Include leash = free toy lmao.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Fits most standard sized cats in middle range of adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2 year old cat that is slightly more round she gave birth once and has a looser chest and stomach, used to be a stray so she likes to go outdoors alot but i dont want her to run away haha. Fits good and she likes it now she didnt at first she went nuts trying to rub it off on anything and everything, even biting it but shes accustom to it now.
customer_reviews.author: Riker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put on. My cat got used to it after the first day! Cat loves going on road trips now, but still doesn't like getting walked. Good quality, has not had any damage with the cat sometimes trying to take it off or scratch underneath it. Would buy again, very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10-11lb floofy cat. I like that it has the double snap closures as opposed to the leashes that go over the head. So far my cat has not been able to escape from it. I do wish the leash was longer though. My main issue is that I wish the two straps were ~2cm further apart. I guess my cat has a longer neck so it's a slightly awkward /short fit.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Sara Alperson

customer_reviews.title: Good idea BUT it didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: Good idea BUT it didn't work for us! Not because of the product just because my cat is crazy! :) ...The funniest part of this product is the instructions on the back. Very carefully written and obviously with the cat's safety and well-being in mind. However, I didn't do as instructed. BUT, again it just didn't work for us because my 100% indoor cat once she got the taste of freedom, she meowed and wailed 24/7 to be let out again!!! She got totally obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: 110lbslost

customer_reviews.title: Harness is well designed and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great harness and leash. Harness is well designed and well made. I'd give it 5 stars but which it was just a little longer. The girth measures 17 inches and I've got a rather large (big, not fat) cat. It would be a lot easier to put it on him if there was more length and then I could tighten it up after it is clipped on. Just my opinion. Now, if I could only get the cat to stop walking backwards, or hiding under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: Almost too small for long slender cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves being able to outside. The harness is narrow and light weight so that kind of worries me but it's held up so far and he has not been able to escape. He is long and slender, about 10lbs and the chest is completely let out and the neck still has about an inch of space. If your cat is fat or even mildly overweight , this one probably won't fit. It will only fit 2 of my 4 cats.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Cat loved it. Adjustable so it fits both our skinny cat and our fat cat. Great for taking your cats to the vet or if you have a cat that wants to go outside but you don't want them to run away. Can't get out of it like they can other harnesses. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Becca P.

customer_reviews.title: The colors (red and blue) are vibrant and look just like the image shown
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and bought two of these harnesses. The colors (red and blue) are vibrant and look just like the image shown. It took them a minute, but both of them love the harnesses and when I put them on, they head straight for the door, because they know it means they get to go outside. My only issue is I wish it was a little wider around the back and stomach, as I sometimes worry it might be a bit uncomfortable (although they don't show any signs of discomfort)
customer_reviews.author: Sommerleigh Pollonais

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: This was a good leash for a couple weeks.. my cat dragged it on the ground a few times and it basically tore apart. It’s still usable but completely ratty looking. The leash is not very long either. I would suggest getting a better one if you want one to keep and actually be able to walk your car often with. It didn’t seem like my cat was uncomfortable but it definitely didn’t seem as comfortable as higher end ones. But that should be pretty obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Was worried my cat was NOT going to get used to this. But he got adjusted within an hour of being in it and once we got outside he wasn’t bothered at all! I was a little worried because the buckles are plastic so I had another leash attached to his a more sturdy ‘travel’ collar just to be cautious. It seems very sturdy and reliable and I’m excited to travel with the harness on rather than him in a crate
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, kitty accepted this one finally.
customer_reviews.text: We tried several harnesses before, but, this one fitted the best. Our 2-year old kitty was so comfortable and didn't try to take it off. We let him wear this for one or two hours everyday; then from next week, we'll train him on leash walking. Its great for summers as well as its light weight and not very overwhelming. I definitely recommend this product. There's no need to make the harness super tight around your kitty's neck or waist, esp in the beginning. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable, and secure.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice harness for cats! It is adjustable, and secure so your cat isn’t going to break free and run off. We got this for my indoor cat who enjoys being outside but we didnt wana make him and outdoor cat , so each day we take him out on his harness. I do wish the leash was longer, but over all great product! I highly recommend it for Cat parents, and obviously it takes time for the Cat to adjust to it. But our little guy knows now when his harness is on its outside time and I feel okay knowing he won’t run off.
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light weight for cats
customer_reviews.text: Good adjustments at neck and behind front legs. I think the space between them is a little short, though. Light weight, but works well. My kitten won't walk with it yet, but allows me to let him take in the outdoors without worry. The clasps are plastic and you have to pinch one a little to make it close, but overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: CARANA

customer_reviews.title: Best one so far!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other harnesses but they are bulky at the neck and always looked rigid and choking on my cat. This one frees her neck up and she’s wayyyy more comfy. Just make sure you have it on tight enough they can’t slip out. She loves coming outside now. The other style,she just sits there in fear. This one,she roams around and forgets it’s on. I bought a retractable leash to go with it!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Cat has finally met her match
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust for a variety of sizes, and the pink color is very visible. Nice and sturdy leash as well. Main complaint is that the clasps are hard to get closed due to the way they are made, but once they're closed, they /stay/ closed. Clever, wiggly feline of mine has yet to figure out how to escape THIS harness. I assume her satisfaction is inversely proportional to mine.
customer_reviews.author: C.R.

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit for the cat
customer_reviews.text: I was dumb and thought I could get away with putting a small dog harness on my cat. However, it was so hard to get her to get used to the harness and I didn't know why! I bought this little, cat harness instead and it fits her perfectly and it gives a cat its desired range of motion. I'm getting her used to it right now, and hopefully she'll want to go outside! I would recommend for cat owners who have indoor cats that wouldn't mind being outside or in new environments. This product is perfect for the adventure kitty!
customer_reviews.author: Chilled tulip

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but moves around the body.
customer_reviews.text: I am almost using it on my cat very day when we go out. The problem is, it does not have a lower body strap that goes between the front legs and that causes the harnes to move around the body in way that the leash connection is not always on the back. It was prefect if they could add a chest strap or figure out a way to prevent this. Prefect harness otherwise, and comfy. BTW, no scaping from this one. I have used it from when he was less than 3lbs to now that he is 7lbs. Of course my cat is not a escaping type unless he wants to go somewhere and I don't allow it!
customer_reviews.author: Armin Tabari

customer_reviews.title: Safety Hazard for Pets not used to harnesses
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my girlfriend to use on her two cats. Her cats were fine for a couple hours till one of them started bitting at it while they had it on and got one of the strands of the fabric loose somehow, I'm assuming continuous gnawing at it- and her cat almost choked because a thick strand of string got lodged in it's mouth caught between its tongue and teeth somehow. Scary moment, we threw it away immediately afterwards. I don't know how well it works on cats who are used to harnesses but we definitely won't be trying with this one specifically again because of the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: AmiSunn

customer_reviews.title: small!
customer_reviews.text: This harness is way too small for my cat! The long strap connecting the chest and neck pieces is too short for my cat, therefore pulling at his neck. He is a big cat but this was disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Emily Love

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and fit my cat perfectly. My only ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and fit my cat perfectly. My only oversight is that I didn't realize I might need something more padded to avoid hurting my cat since she got scared once or twice and tried running away and tugged really hard on the harness. She was coughing for a solid minute.
customer_reviews.author: arely soriano

customer_reviews.title: The Right H Shape Harness
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this harness for my bunny. He did not like the vest style as they are too restricting. I read the H shape harness is great for bunnies, and I have to say I agree 100%. The fit is perfect, the leash is nice and sturdy (not like the bungy leads), the purple is a really pretty deep purple and best of all, my little guy is happy in the harness. Great packaging and great harness!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Great company!
customer_reviews.text: When we received this, it was in a great package with gift card. Had such kind instructions on how to get kitty used to it too. I followed exactly as they said and it worked. Harness doesn't freak her out at all. I really appreciate their very good advice.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased with these. I haven’t taken my cats out for a walk or anything, but rather bought them for extra assurance at the airport before we traveled with the cats - particularly in case they got agitated at the TSA check point. While they didn’t struggle or anything, these feel sturdy and secure. Cats didn’t seem to mind them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I did a long research before buying, read a lot of blogs, Instagram profiles of people who walk their cats etc. this harness and leash were listed in the top 5 most of the times and had the extra benefit of not being gigantic. I wanted something subtle for my cat not to feel uncomfortable and this really worked out. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Great way to bond with your cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat was very hesitant when he first tried on the harness and acted like he was incapacitated. Now, he's very chill when we put it on and he acts like his normal crazy self when he's wearing it - took about 3 days. The leash is another story...definitely going to take a lot more practice. I think it's definitely a great way to bond with your cat, you both learn a lot of trust and patience with a good quality product, I'd highly recommend to any cat mom or dad! 😻
customer_reviews.author: Annalis Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Great leash for kitten
customer_reviews.text: This leash was great. It was a little difficult to put on at first because our kitten was scared of it but we used treats to get it on her. The leash is great, no complaints, but our kitten was afraid to be outside and ran back inside of the house. I am keeping it and will try again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ss910

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again  except for one thing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Harness, my cat adjusted well to it and it has held up very well, my only concern is the length of the piece that s from neck to shoulders is very short as they are growing there is plenty of room for adjustment around waist and neck. When i purchased this he was 5 lbs and is now 7 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hansen

customer_reviews.title: The leash is pretty short and thin so I think I will be ...
customer_reviews.text: The harness seems very durable and is adjustable to fit a fairly wide range of cat sizes. My cat is about 10 lbs and was in the middle of the settings. I found it was easier to put it on my cat if I made the straps longer than necessary and then tightened them once I fastened them around her. The leash is pretty short and thin so I think I will be getting a hardier leash to use with the harness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy this
customer_reviews.text: My cat will definitely enjoy his cat walks more now. I ordered a harness body suit type from other seller . It was bulky and slipping of his body. This harness he dosent mind at all. It's thin and I love the fact it's on his neck n body. Happy cat happy me.
customer_reviews.author: Olisita

customer_reviews.title: Works great. It's not quite as sturdy as the other ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It's not quite as sturdy as the other one for cat #2 but it's fine and comes with a nice leash. Excellent value. Cat likes to pretend humans aren't around.
customer_reviews.author: hollypearl

customer_reviews.title: Too big for 2 lbs, too small for 12 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a "first training harness" for my two-month-old kittens. However, at only slightly over two pounds, it's still pretty loose around their chests. Not loose enough that they can wiggle out, but loose enough that it bothers them (they're hard to train when they're flipping out because "something's touching me!"). I tried putting it on my 12-pound adult cat, and at full extension it fits well around his neck, but is a little tight around his chest. In another month, I'm sure this will be a perfect fit for my kittens!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kolligian

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for cats larger than average
customer_reviews.text: The harness itself is fine, and easily re-sizable, but the piece between the neck loop and chest loop is REALLY short. If your cat is even slightly larger than average, this harness won't work very well because it causes the loop that goes behind the front legs to pull tightly into the cats armpits, making walking difficult for them. This will work great for small cats, but it didn't work at all for our cat. He's not that big by cat standards, and the harness loops easily adjusted to his neck and chest, but the top part really needs to be adjustable, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Persian hairball pretty in pink
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a harness that would let my cat come outside with us without Velcro closures. This is perfect! I used it yesterday for the first time and she seemed to be comfortable walking around the little bit she did. She didn't do the alligator roll to get out of it like she has with others that I have tried. With the amount of hair she has (Persian cat) the non velcro clips are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: tygarmom

customer_reviews.title: One of the best harnesses I've used.
customer_reviews.text: Like most people's cats, my cat loves to go outdoors, but I have always used harnesses that cause my cat to feel uncomfortable and not move at all - he seems frozen when harnesses are on him. This one, however, is so thin that he doesn't seem to notice too much and still has fun outside. I got the reflective black color, and it is really nice quality and super bright when light is shined on! It is also very thin, but VERY secure! You can adjust the neck and the body straps and it seems very comfortable. I highly recommend trying this, and at the price - it seems worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Escaped!
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I caught it. And it is the first time in 3 months. But it is not the best choice if you have a stubborn and active cat like mine... They can escape it. In the sense that cats can get rid of them without hurting themselves, you can say this is safe for cats I guess...
customer_reviews.author: D.E.Fox

customer_reviews.title: Simple is Best
customer_reviews.text: This simple harness was far better than the more expensive "comfortable" "No slip through" harnesses. For one, it's simple and lightweight. Those others with velcro, harnesses that nearly cover the whole animal, were very constricting and she hated them. This one is like her collar. She doesn't even notice it. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: HershyMouse

product_meta.title: PUPTECK Adjustable Cat Harness Nylon Strap Collar with Leash
feature_bullets: Nylon lead and harness for your small cat or puppies under 12 pounds. This standard lead fits around the cat’s neck and back to evenly distribute pressure, size adjustable for both young kitty to adult cats.
Adjustable "H" style cat harness with durable snap-lock buckles, easy put on/take off.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
